title: Amount spent on smartphone accessories by U.S. consumers 2010
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 3 different Responses for 4 groups Under $50, $50 - $100, $100 - $200, and $200 and up that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 4 groups, Under $50 had the highest Share of respondents in Response Android owners and $200 and up had the lowest Share of respondents in Response BlackBerry owners.
Among all the Responses, $100 - $200 had the highest Share of respondents 19.0 in Response iPhone owners and lowest value 8.0 in Response Android owners.
Response iPhone owners and Android owners had the biggest gap of 11.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for $100 - $200.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Responses on X-axis for 4 groups Under $50, $50 - $100, $100 - $200, and $200 and up. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
In Response Android owners, Under $50 had the highest Share of respondents 60.0 among the 4 groups and in BlackBerry owners, $200 and up had the lowest Share of respondents 1.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 3 different Responses for 4 groups Under $50, $50 - $100, $100 - $200, and $200 and up that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 4 groups, Under $50 had the highest Share of respondents in Response Android owners and $200 and up had the lowest Share of respondents in Response BlackBerry owners.
Among all the Responses, $100 - $200 had the highest Share of respondents 19.0 in Response iPhone owners and lowest value 8.0 in Response Android owners.
Response iPhone owners and Android owners had the biggest gap of 11.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for $100 - $200.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Responses on X-axis for 4 groups Under $50, $50 - $100, $100 - $200, and $200 and up. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
In Response Android owners, Under $50 had the highest Share of respondents 60.0 among the 4 groups and in BlackBerry owners, $200 and up had the lowest Share of respondents 1.0.
In Response iPhone owners, $100 - $200 had the maximum Share of respondents and it saw the lowest in Response Android owners out of all 3 Responses.
Response iPhone owners and Android owners had the biggest gap of 11.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for $100 - $200.
Among all 4 groups, Under $50 had the gap of 27.0 between the maximum and minimum Share of respondents observed in Response Android owners and iPhone owners respectively.

Under $50 had the maximum Share of respondents out of all 4 groups in Response Android owners followed by Under $50 in Android owners, and the minimum Share of respondents is found for $200 and up in BlackBerry owners.
Averaging all 4 groups Under $50, $50 - $100, $100 - $200, and $200 and up, the Response BlackBerry owners is the maximum Share of respondents and Android owners is the minimum Share of respondents.
